name: raycast-icons-preview
title: Icons Preview
description: Preview SVG icons from local folders in a beautiful grid view
author: peckz

commands.name: preview-icons
commands.title: Preview Icons
commands.description: Browse and preview SVG icons from configured folders

preferences.name: iconFolders
preferences.title: Icon Folders
preferences.description: Comma-separated paths to folders containing SVG icons (e.g., /path/to/icons1,/path/to/icons2)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
